steps.name: gcr.io/google.com/cloudsdktool/cloud-sdk
args:
set -e && 
\
  echo 'Fetching secrets...' && 
\
  SECRET_NAME=$(gcloud secrets versions access latest --secret=NAME) && 
\
  SECRET_API=$(gcloud secrets versions access latest --secret=API) && 
\
  echo "Fetched NAME: $_SECRET_NAME" && 
\
  echo "Calling API: $_SECRET_API/krane/get-app-data?name=$_SECRET_NAME" && 
\
  _CLIENT_REPOS_JSON=$(curl -s -L "$SECRET_API/krane/get-app-data?name=$SECRET_NAME") && 
\
  echo "Response: $_CLIENT_REPOS_JSON" && 
\
  echo "$_CLIENT_REPOS_JSON" | jq -c '.repos.client[]' | while read -r client; do 
\
    PROJECT_NAME=$(echo "$client" | jq -r '.name'); 
\
    echo "Cloning $_PROJECT_NAME into client/$_PROJECT_NAME"; 
\
    git clone https://github.com/genesiskrane/gk-vite "client/$_PROJECT_NAME"; 
\
    cd "client/$_PROJECT_NAME"; 
\
    npm install; 
\
    npx vite build; 
\
    find . -mindepth 1 ! -name 'dist' ! -path './dist/*' -exec rm -rf {} +; 
\
    cd -; 
\
  done
